<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">extern</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcremarks/#ga8065752effe66fd6b55586f04028cccd">LLVMRemarkParserRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcremarks/#ga67a4d14fa2dd7a2908b0888dc1ffbd8d">LLVMRemarkParserCreateYAML</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Buf,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; Creates a remark parser that can be used to parse the buffer located in \\p</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; Buf of size \\p Size bytes.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; \\p Buf cannot be &#96;NULL&#96;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; This function should be paired with LLVMRemarkParserDispose() to avoid</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; leaking resources.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; \\since REMARKS&#95;API&#95;VERSION=1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">extern</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcremarks/#ga8065752effe66fd6b55586f04028cccd">LLVMRemarkParserRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcremarks/#ga3876e400217122e91a34c002981bc82d">LLVMRemarkParserCreateBitstream</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Buf,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                           uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; Returns the next remark in the file.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; The value pointed to by the return value needs to be disposed using a call to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; LLVMRemarkEntryDispose().</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; All the entries in the returned value that are of LLVMRemarkStringRef type</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; will become invalidated once a call to LLVMRemarkParserDispose is made.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; If the parser reaches the end of the buffer, the return value will be &#96;NULL&#96;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; In the case of an error, the return value will be &#96;NULL&#96;, and:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; 1) LLVMRemarkParserHasError() will return &#96;1&#96;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; 2) LLVMRemarkParserGetErrorMessage() will return a descriptive error</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;    message.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; An error may occur if:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; 1) An argument is invalid.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; 2) There is a parsing error. This can occur on things like malformed YAML.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; 3) There is a Remark semantic error. This can occur on well-formed files with</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;    missing or extra fields.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; Here is a quick example of the usage:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; LLVMRemarkParserRef Parser = LLVMRemarkParserCreateYAML(Buf, Size);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; LLVMRemarkEntryRef Remark = NULL;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; while ((Remark = LLVMRemarkParserGetNext(Parser))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;    // use Remark</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;    LLVMRemarkEntryDispose(Remark); // Release memory.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; bool HasError = LLVMRemarkParserHasError(Parser);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; LLVMRemarkParserDispose(Parser);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; \\since REMARKS&#95;API&#95;VERSION=0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">extern</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcremarks/#ga124978db2f97610eed656328fe801d64">LLVMRemarkEntryRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcremarks/#gada1d7ab2d57b735d67fa095bc099cc7f">LLVMRemarkParserGetNext</a>(<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcremarks/#ga8065752effe66fd6b55586f04028cccd">LLVMRemarkParserRef</a> Parser);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; Returns &#96;1&#96; if the parser encountered an error while parsing the buffer.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; \\since REMARKS&#95;API&#95;VERSION=0</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; Returns a null-terminated string containing an error message.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; In case of no error, the result is &#96;NULL&#96;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; The memory of the string is bound to the lifetime of \\p Parser. If</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; LLVMRemarkParserDispose() is called, the memory of the string will be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; released.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="comment"> &#42; \\since REMARKS&#95;API&#95;VERSION=0</Highlight></CodeLine>
